r.d: This extension uses libgearman library to provide API for communicating with gearmand, and writing clients and workers.
r.n: - libgearman v1.1.* is now required - Fixed PECL bug #60877 (no way to set client_id for a GearmanWorker) - Fixed BC breaks in libgearman v1.1.0 - Make phpversion('gearman') return the real version
